definitions.definition: Suitable to effect some desired end or the purpose intended .
examples: Most people, faced with a decision, will choose the most expedient option.

definitions.definition: Affording short-term benefit , often at the expense of the long-term .
Governed by self-interest , often short-term self-interest.

main_definition: Suitable to effect some desired end or the purpose intended .
secondary_definitions: Affording short-term benefit , often at the expense of the long-term .
Governed by self-interest , often short-term self-interest.
